title: Pork and Nori Soup
ingredients: ['500g (1 1/4 lb) minced pork', '2L (3 1/4 pints) water', '1 chicken stock cubes', '1 (220g) tin water chestnuts, sliced', '3 sheets nori (dried seaweed), broken into pieces', '1 egg, beaten', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 spring onions, chopped', '3/4 teaspoon sesame oil']
